channel.title: RuneLifeX where the fun begins! Many updates to come!
channel.description:
-All Skills Trainable -Grotworms RS Spawn Locations -QBD With Rewards Room -All Emotes Working On The Emotes Tab -Multiplayer Kalphite Queen -Multiplayer Construction -Special Summoning Pets -Yell Color ~ for everyone! -Donator Zone Is Huge -Home Is At Keldagrim For Now -Godwars Is Reworked -Remapped Tokhaar Jad -Easy To Load And Has Great High Detail Settings -Thieving Guild -All Agility Arenas Coded -New Banker Dialogue -Jadinko Lair And Vines Coded -Polypore Dungeon Objects and Spawns Coded -Custom ::afk Zone! -great thieveing! -perfect exp -Very active staff! -Bank notes! -Perfect pking/switching -no Lag,dupes,glitches,nulls,blackscreens!
SCREENSHOTS!!--- [url=http://prntscr.com/30nebj]Screenshot by Lightshot[/url] [url=http://prntscr.com/30nedn]Screenshot by Lightshot[/url] [url=http://prntscr.com/30neez]Screenshot by Lightshot[/url] [url=http://prntscr.com/30neh6]Screenshot by Lightshot[/url] [url=http://prntscr.com/30neid]Screenshot by Lightshot[/url] [url=http://prntscr.com/30nelq]Screenshot by Lightshot[/url] [url=http://prntscr.com/30neng]Screenshot by Lightshot[/url] [url=http://prntscr.com/30neoy]Screenshot by Lightshot[/url]
website link! [url=http://w11.zetaboards.com/runelifex]Runelifex[/url] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/a7zwctcvq82nl75/Runelifex.jar]Download link[/url]
~Update List~ 1. change home (in prog) 2. rework dungeoneering (not started) 3.add customs (in prog) 4. make custom bosses (not started 5.4gb vps ddos protcted (completed) 6.make crucible 100% (not started 7.add 2nd world. (not started)
